#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
int dp[301][301];
int main()
{
    int T,val;
    scanf("%d",&T);
    while(T--)
    {
        int ball,storied;
        scanf("%d %d",&storied,&ball);
        //base case
        for(int i=1;i<=storied;i++)dp[1][i]=i;
        for(int i=1;i<=ball;i++)
        {
            dp[i][1] = 1;
            dp[i][0] = 0;
        }

        for(int i=2;i<=ball;i++)
        {
            for(int k=2;k<=storied;k++)
            {
                dp[i][k]= 1<<29;
                for(int x=1;x<=k;x++)
                {
                    val = 1+ max(dp[i-1][x-1],dp[i][k-x]);
                    dp[i][k] = min(dp[i][k],val);
                }
            }
        }
        printf("%d\n",dp[ball][storied]+ball);
    }
    return 0;
}
